<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King, a proclamation containing His Majesties gracious and ample indemnity Scotland. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James VII) James II, King of England, 1633-1701.
1 broadside.
Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson ..., Edinburgh : 1688.
"Given at our court at White-hall, the twenty fifth day of September, 1688. And of our reign, the fourth year." Imperfect: cropped around royal arms of head. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
